title: Domain Association
description: Schema for a domain association JSON file. Domain associations describe constraint relationships between domains where a problem domain enforces requirements on a solution domain. If validation fails, verify 'problem_domain_key' and 'solution_domain_key' are both present and non-empty.

problem_domain_key.description: The key of the problem domain that enforces requirements. Must be a non-empty string matching an existing domain key.

solution_domain_key.description: The key of the solution domain that satisfies the requirements. Must be a non-empty string matching an existing domain key.

uml_comment.description: Optional UML comment for this domain association.
